Historic Investments in Infrastructure

New York State is making historic investments in infrastructure, from transportation to clean energy projects and beyond. This dashboard reflects a summary of funding that has been dedicated to New York through the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law and Inflation Reduction Act.

  • $17 Billion

    Transportation

  • $1 Billion

    Water

  • $729 Million

    Clean Energy

The stats cards above are similar to the ones located on the Governor's Website
